CustomField.formula: IF(AND(vlocity_ins__StartDateTime__c < NOW(), vlocity_ins__IsEnabled__c, OR(ISNULL(vlocity_ins__EndDateTime__c), vlocity_ins__EndDateTime__c > NOW())), "Active",IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(vlocity_ins__EndDateTime__c)),vlocity_ins__EndDateTime__c < NOW(), vlocity_ins__IsEnabled__c), "Expired",IF(AND(vlocity_ins__StartDateTime__c > NOW(), vlocity_ins__IsEnabled__c), "Pending", "Inactive")))
CustomField.label: Current Status
